name: Super Star Trek (CBM PET)
description:
This has been a very arduous conversion project. I have taken the original source code of the 80 column terminal based game and converted it to run on a 40 column Commodore PET.

This program uses ZERO cursor control codes, just carriage returns, like the original terminal-based games of the 70s. No mainframe required!

There will likely be bugs, so please let me know.
